actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A resolution to call on the President to declare a national emergency for the purpose of suspending the Davis-Bacon Act.

summary.text: Calls on the President, in the exercise of authority under the Davis-Bacon Act, to declare a national economic emergency and suspend the provisions of such Act and the provisions of all other Acts providing for the payment of wages on the basis of determinations of the Secretary of Labor concerning wage rates on public works projects under such Act.

titles.title: A resolution to call on the President to declare a national emergency for the purpose of suspending the Davis-Bacon Act.
